Developer Terms of Use
des:
Want to use temperature sensors and control your switches? 
By using this skill, you can ask Alexa about the temperature sensor's reading, and control your switches easily.

You can turn the switches on/off or turn multiple of them at the same time by using alexa groups. 
You can also ask alexa about the temperature in the room that you have set the temperature sensor on. 

How to start? 
1- You would need to download the XIOT app, which's available on both App store and Google play. 
2- Register an account on XIOT. 
3- Configure your devices on the app. 
4- Link your account with alexa by enabling the skill at Alexa app. 
5- Allow discovering devices
6- Enjoy and control your smart devices!


Commands to try with alexa, with the devices that you have set on the office room for example: 

1- "Alexa, turn on my office lights"
2- "Alexa, turn off my offile lights"
3- "Alexa, what's the temperature in my office?"
